text: flma tarakuu aleamal bi'awamir allah taealaa mueridin enha, fatahna ealayhim 'abwab kuli shay' min alrizq fabdlnahm bialbasa' rkha'an fi aleysh, wbaldra' sihat fi alajsam; astdraja minaa lhm, hataa 'iidha btru, waejbu bima aetynahm min alkhayr walnemt 'akhadhnahum bialeadhab fjat, fa'iidha hum ayswn mnqtewn min kuli khyr
